alma.scheduling.planning_mode_sim.scheduler.r1policy
Class DynamicSchedulingAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--alma.scheduling.planning_mode_sim.scheduler.r1policy.DynamicSchedulingAlgorithm
public class DynamicSchedulingAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object

This is the dynamic scheduling algorithm for R1. The way this will be implemented when we have more than one scheduling policy concept is the following. All such classes will be called DynamicSchedulingAlgorithm and placed in distinct packages. Each will have a static name that identifies the algorithm. Then we will use the Java classloader to load the appropriate algorithm based on the scheduling policy.

Version:
1.00 Sep 26, 2003
Author:
Allen Farris
